source:
%%sql

-- Build SourceSystem_Fact table
--INSERT OVERWRITE achieves the same as a TRUNCATE TABLE and INSERT INTO but in one statement

INSERT INTO odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact

SELECT
    1 AS SourceSystemID,
    "SAP HR" AS Description,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5("SAP HR") as RowID,
    "Y" AS IsActive

%%sql

INSERT INTO odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact

SELECT
    2 AS SourceSystemID,
    "Legacy MWR" AS Description,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5("Legacy MWR") as RowID,
    "Y" AS IsActive

%%sql

SELECT

    "Y" AS IsActive
